name: xVARKx
text: Food is typically good and hot we have never had a problem with that... But 3.99 for a delivery fee that is not a tip for the driver (as it says) is a little rediculious... That just seems a bit steep....

text: This was the worst pizza from them ever. Ordered delivery, but would take 2 hours. So ordered take out and picked it up. The pizza was like shoe leather and burnt no flavor and one with the wrong crust.. when we called them about it they didn't care. Don't go here it is horrible.

text: This restaurant technically exists, but is basically a scam.  No concept of time or service, and the dump actually ran out of pepperoni.  Completely useless on all fronts.  Don't order from here, call here, or have anything to do with them.
